title: Were police tactics in Belucci Dickri Trump while funding them?
subtitle: The President's "law and order" approach to maintaining security on Twitter was quickly criticized by senior Democrats. But do their budget decisions say otherwise?
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: The President of the United States House of Representatives publicly criticized the actions of federal agents in United States cities during the protests in 2020 - while at the same time supporting the budget bill that would finance these law enforcement efforts.
